cause.description:
Ambassadors International Ministries is born out of compassion that drives us to do what we can to alleviate the pain and suffering of HIV/AIDS and help remove its cause GLOBALLY. We are a non-profit organization based in Longmont, Colorado.
1. showing compassion to our global neighbors
cause.mission: Ambassadors International Ministries mission is to bring Christian solutions to the global AIDS pandemic and all its attending consequences.
cause.name: Ambassadors International Ministries
